comments.content:
It’s not new even the content does update regularly.

If anybody knows more of these great site this is maybe the place to share them?  
Sorry Christopher didn’t really want to take over your post ;)

I'm a huge fan of [PostTypography](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121419/http:/www.posttypography.com/). Not so much of a blog, but a portfolio with funky yet functional navigation. It's a nice breather from a lot of traditional computer rendered typography treatments. I've always been keen to getting off the box and hand rendering some letters, but it's much tougher than it seems. Practice I guess...

Johan Vilchez

No need to apologize, that's what were here for.

[I posted this one a few days ago in another thread.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121419/http:/www.smashingmagazine.com/2009/03/12/fantastic-typography-blogs-for-your-inspiration/)
